RelatedSentence: Islamabad : Reacting to the Bharatiya Janata Party 's victory in the Lok Sabha elections , 26/11 mastermind and Jamaat - ud - Dawa chief Hafiz Saeed has said that there is no longer a chance of improved relations with India .
Addressing a gathering in Islamabad , Saeed said the recent election was won on an anti-Pakistan and non-secular agenda .
